Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Okhurula khale benya okhubarerera obutswanzwani, mana nibakhukalukhanilia amakhuwa okhula shingala obulamba bwalolokha khulikhuwa lia Nyasaye nabo nibalachamile tawe
Ne mubo balimwo baboolanga mbu; “mbe obwiyangu ne olasukuna mumatemo tawe” Toto abo bamala okhukwa mumatemo, ne toto Jahannam ilibotokhana Abakhayi
Nonyoola obulayi bibasinyisia, ne nonyoola amasila baboola mbu; “Khwahenga obulayi amakhuwa kefu okhurula khale( okhukhaya okhunyoolwa namasila), ne bakalukhananga nibabwao nibasangalile.”
Boola; “sishitsa okhunyoola shiosi shiosi habula shilia shia Nyasaye yakhuhandichila, Ye ni Nyasaye wefu” Kho Nyasaye butswa niye Owabasuubili besiche

Boola; “Enywe shimulindanga khwife halali (efwe) okhunyoola shilala khubulayi bubili. Ne efwe khulindanga Nyasaye abasandie nende eshinyasio okhurula khuye nohomba okhurulana nende emikhono chiefu, kho linde butswa fwesi khuliindanga ninanyu
Boola; “ Rusie emiandu chienyu nimuchamile nohomba nimulachamile, shikhula chifuchilila tawe. Toto enywe muli Abandu abonooni.’’
Ne sishiabekalila okhuchamilwa eshihanwa shiabu halali nibo bakhaya Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe. Ne shibetsanga okhulama tawe halali nibali abatofu, ne bahininjia eshihanwa nibalachamile tawe
